Source code for trading.views

"""
Views for trading
"""
from django.shortcuts import render
from stocks.models import InvestmentBucket
from django.http import HttpResponse
from django.contrib.auth.models import User
from stocks.models import InvestmentBucket, Stock
import random, string




[docs]def test(request):
    """
    Dev method for buckets
    """
    user = User.objects.create(username=''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_uppercase + string.digits, k=5)), password="iscool")
    trading_account = user.profile.trading_accounts.create(
        account_name="spesh"
    )
    buff = InvestmentBucket(name="buffet", owner=user.profile, public=False, available=1)
    buff.save()
    print(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
    trading_account.trade_bucket(buff, 1)
    print(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
    trading_account.trade_bucket(buff, 1)
    print(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
    trading_account.trade_bucket(buff, -1)
    print(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
    trading_account.trade_bucket(buff, -1)
    print(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
    # trading_account.trade_bucket(buff, -1)
    # print(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
    return HttpResponse(trading_account.available_buckets(buff))
